PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceHeaterPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Space heater performance history common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: FractionRadiantHeatTransfer
PropertyDef.Definition: Fraction of the total heat transfer rate as the radiant heat transfer.

PropertyDef.Name: FractionConvectiveHeatTransfer
PropertyDef.Definition: Fraction of the total heat transfer rate as the convective heat transfer.

PropertyDef.Name: Effectiveness
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the change in dry bulb temperature of the (primary) air stream to the difference between the entering dry bulb temperature of the (primary) air and the wet-bulb temperature of the (secondary) air.

PropertyDef.Name: SurfaceTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Average surface temperature of the component.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceAirTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Dry bulb temperature in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceMeanRadiantTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Mean radiant temperature in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: UACurve
PropertyDef.Definition: UA curve as function of ambient temperature and surface temperature; UA = f (Tambient, Tsurface)

PropertyDef.Name: OutputCapacityCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Partial output capacity curve (as a function of water temperature); Q = f (Twater).

PropertyDef.Name: AirResistanceCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Air resistance curve (w/ fan only); Pressure = f ( flow rate).

PropertyDef.Name: Exponent
PropertyDef.Definition: Characteristic exponent, slope of log(heat output) vs log (surface temperature minus environmental temperature).
